live_reports.headline: Kenya’s Parliament Engages in Heated Debate Over New Tax Reform
live_reports.summary: Members of the Kenyan Parliament are locked in an intense discussion about a proposed tax reform aimed at increasing revenue for public projects. While some argue it will burden the lower-income population, others insist it’s crucial for economic growth.

live_reports.headline: Heavy Rain Causes Flooding in Coastal Areas of Kenya
live_reports.summary: Unusually heavy rains have led to flash floods in parts of Mombasa, disrupting transportation and displacing residents. Authorities are urging caution and evacuation from low-lying areas.

live_reports.headline: Rising Malaria Cases in Uganda Amid Ongoing Rainy Season
live_reports.summary: Health officials in Uganda report an increase in malaria cases, attributing it to stagnant water from recent rains. Community health programs are intensifying prevention efforts in affected areas.

live_reports.headline: Tanzania’s New Trade Deal Sparks Optimism for Economic Growth
live_reports.summary: The government of Tanzania signed a trade agreement with the European Union, expected to boost exports and job creation. Officials express hope that this will lead to a stronger economy in the region.

live_reports.headline: Rwanda Hosts Innovation Summit Highlighting Tech Growth in East Africa
live_reports.summary: Rwanda’s capital, Kigali, is hosting a tech innovation summit that brings together tech leaders, innovators, and investors from across Africa to discuss advancements and challenges in technology.
